name: Summit (UnavailableGames)
description:
Summit

During the 1860s gold rush in British Columbia, an individual separates themselves from a society built on greed. they embark into the wilderness to find their new purpose in life.

  • EXPLORE A BEAUTIFUL FOREST
  • DISCOVER THE WILDERNESS
  • UNCOVER THE STORY OF A PAST NOMAD

REACH THE SUMMIT
